temples.name: Philadelphia Temple
temples.services: Clothing rental, No cafeteria, No patron housing, Distribution center nearby.
temples.history: Announced on October 4, 2008, and the groundbreaking on September 17, 2011. It was dedicated on September 18, 2016.
temples.ordinanceSch: All ordinances are currently by appointment only.
temples.sessionSch: All sessions are currently by appointment only.
temples.closureSch: 19 September 2022 - 10 October 2022, 23 November 2022 - 24 November 2022, 24 December 2022 - 25 December 2022, 31 December 2022

temples.name: Salt Lake Temple
temples.services: Clothing rental, No cafeteria food served, No patron housing, Distribution center nearby.
temples.history: Announced on July 28, 1847, and the groundbreaking on February 14, 1853. It was dedicated on April 6, 1893.
temples.closureSch: Temple closed for renovation. Open house and rededication dates not yet announced.

temples.sessionSch: All sessions are currently by appointment only.

temples.name: Washington D.C. Temple
temples.services: Clothing rental, No cafeteria food served, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby.
temples.history: Announced on November 15, 1968, and the groundbreaking was on December 7, 1968. It was dedicated on November 19, 1974, and then rededicated on August 14, 2022.
temples.closureSch: Temple closed for renovation. Open house and rededication on 14 August 2022.

temples.name: Mesa Arizona Temple
temples.services: Clothing rental, No cafeteria, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby.
temples.history: Announced on October 1, 1919, and the groundbreaking was on April 25, 1922. It was dedicated on October 23, 1927, and then rededicated on April 15, 1975, and then again on December 12, 2021.
temples.ordinanceSch: All ordinances are currently by appointment only.
temples.sessionSch: All sessions are currently by appointment only.
temples.closureSch: 18 July 2022 - 1 August 2022, 1 October 2022, 24 November 2022, 24 December 2022, 31 December 2022
